summary: This fix is to get rid of Farkas or Vikas constantly trying to talk to you with there weapon drawn
descriptionHtml:
This fix is to get rid of Farkas or Vikas constantly trying to talk to you with there weapon drawn

This is a pretty simple fix but this personally pissed me off

Check out my actual mods
Immersion
-Dark Dungeons
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51957/?
-The Honored Dead
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52403/?

------DOWNLOAD------
-Just add the esp to your Skyrim data folder

-----Updates--------
-Probably not
-v-1.0.0 is prob going to be the only one
author: JakeOberg
